IP.Name: LPBAMLPUART
IP.About: LPBAMUART: Low Power Background Activity Mode for LPUART

RefParameter.Name: QUEUE_NAME
RefParameter.Comment: Define the name of your Queue

RefParameter.Name: CircularNode_TRANSMIT_CONFIG
RefParameter.Group: Transmit Config

RefParameter.Name: CircularNode_TRANSMIT_DATA
RefParameter.Group: Transmit Data

RefParameter.Group: Receive Config

RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Data Configuration

RefParameter.Name: Size
RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Data Configuration
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the UART data number of bytes.

RefParameter.Name: Mode
RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Basic
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the Receive or Transmit mode is enabled or disabled.

RefParameter.Name: Mode
RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Basic
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the Receive or Transmit mode is enabled or disabled.

RefParameter.Name: AutonomousModeState
RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Autonomous Mode

RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Autonomous Mode

RefParameter.Name: AutoModeTriggerPolarity
RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Autonomous Mode
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the autonomous mode trigger signal polarity sensitivity.

PossibleValue.Comment: HW Trigger signal on rising edge
HW Trigger signal on falling edge

RefParameter.Name: AutoModeTriggerPolarity
RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Autonomous Mode

RefParameter.Name: AutoModeDataSize
RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Autonomous Mode
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the UART data number of bytes to transfer in each packet

RefParameter.Group: UART Parameters - Autonomous Mode
